Reviews.Title: cheaply made, horrendous picture
Reviews.Author: patrick sinclair
Reviews.Content: Feels and looks like a cheap plastic toy, and I cannot stop it from casting everyone and everything in green or purple no matter how I adjust the picture.  I played with it for an hour--tried calling Amazon service which I discovered amounted to me pressing "call now" only to get robo-called and put on hold... Not a good purchase experience from Magnavox or Amazon. Requested the return forms within 2 hours of opening it.  Will buy electronics elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV/DVD combo
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: I recieved this TV as a gift after using a 15 inch TV for a while.  The TV is the perfect size for me and it's great that it has a built in DVD player.  The sound and picture seem to be of a good quality but the only thing I wish it did was tilt.  This particular model does not tilt - only the 19 and 22 inch TV.  But overall, a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: OK for me
Reviews.Author: Butterfly "Butterfly"
Reviews.Content: This little TV works okay, but the speakers do not amplify enough and I am not hard of hearing. Otherwise, it's okay, but not the very best.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built in DVD player
High Powered output for great sound quality when playing video games and watching movies
Clear Pix Engine
Auto Volume leveling
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 26MD311B/F7 26-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD TV (Black)
